Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ObservableView
it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class CLI extends ObservableView implements View
Implements the CLI (command line interface)

    • askId

      public void askId(boolean choice, CharacterCard characterCard, int indexAcrobat, School school)
      Asks the player which island he wants to select (or student on card for cards)
      Specified by:
      askId in interface View
      Parameters:
      choice - true for the selection of an island (that includes the effect of herald and curator) otherwise
      characterCard - played in the round
      indexAcrobat - index for the acrobat effect
      school - of current player
